SEARCH
Package com.lovelettergame

Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.lovelettergame.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Baron, Countess, Guard, Handmaid, King, Priest, Prince, Princess
public abstract class Card extends Object
The Card class represents a card in the Love Letter game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String name, int hierarchy)
      Creates a new Card with the specified name and hierarchy.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the card.
      hierarchy - The hierarchy value of the card.

  • Method Details

    • getCard

      protected static Card getCard(int cardNum)
      A static method to return a Card based on a card number.
      Parameters:
      cardNum - The card number (1-8) for which to get the corresponding card.
      Returns:
      The Card object corresponding to the given card number.

    • effect

      public abstract void effect(Player currentPlayer, List<Player> allPlayers, Scanner scanner)
      An abstract method to be implemented by each card subclass, defining the effect of playing the card.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The current player who plays the card.
      allPlayers - A list of all players in the game.
      scanner - A Scanner object for user input.

    • chooseCardToPlay

      public Card chooseCardToPlay(Scanner scanner)
      Prompts the user to choose a card to play and returns the chosen card.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner object for user input.
      Returns:
      The chosen Card to play.
